mapper.select: select postno, good, dscp, titl, sdt, edt, code, brname, stat, used from post inner join brand on post.comno = brand.comno order by postno desc;
select postno, good, dscp, titl, sdt, edt, code, br.brname, stat, used, br.logo from post p inner join brand br on p.comno = br.comno order by good desc limit 5;

select postno, good, dscp, titl, sdt, edt, code, br.brname, stat, used, br.logo from post p inner join brand br on p.comno = br.comno where sdt > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) && sdt<now() order by sdt desc limit 8;
select postno, good, dscp, titl, sdt, edt, code, br.brname, stat, used, br.logo from post p inner join brand br on p.comno = br.comno where type = 0;

select p.midno, m.midcat, postno, good, dscp, titl, sdt, edt, code, br.brname, stat, used, br.logo from post p inner join brand br on p.comno = br.comno inner join midcat m on p.midno = m.midno where p.midno= #{midno}
mapper.insert: insert into post(mno, midno, comno, titl, dscp, sdt, edt,code, podate, potime, stat, type) values(#{mno}, #{midno}, #{comno},#{titl},#{dscp},#{sdt},#{edt}, #{code},curdate(), curtime(), 0, #{type})
